CustomField.description: This process was updated to display "Product Stored" after birth for those orders that are "New Process". For "Old Process" it displays Product Ordered.
CustomField.formula: if( New_Process__c =true && isblank( Storage_Plan_Stored__c) , if(Cord_Blood_2_0_Ordered__c >= 1, "Cord Blood 2.0,","")+" "+ if( Cord_Tissue_Ordered__c >= 1, "Cord Tissue,","")+" "+ if( Placenta_2_0_Amnion_Ordered__c >= 1, "Placenta 2.0,","")+" "+ if ( Placenta_Tissue_Ordered__c >=1, "Placenta Tissue,","")+" "+ Storage_Plan_Ordered__c+","+" "+ Payment_Plan_Ordered__c+ if(Number_of_Births__c<>"Single",","+" "+Number_of_Births__c,""), if( New_Process__c =true && NOT( isblank( Storage_Plan_Stored__c)), if(Cord_Blood_2_0_Stored__c >= 1, "Cord Blood 2.0,","")+" "+ if( Cord_Tissue_Stored__c >= 1, "Cord Tissue,","")+" "+ if( Placenta_2_0_Amnion_Stored__c >= 1, "Placenta 2.0,","")+" "+ if ( Placenta_Tissue_Stored__c >=1, "Placenta Tissue,","")+" "+ Storage_Plan_Stored__c+","+" "+ Payment_Plan_Stored__c+ if(Number_of_Births__c<>"Single",","+" "+Number_of_Births__c,""), Product_Ordered__c))
CustomField.label: ZDeprecate Product Ordered (for Docusgn)
